function.name: costume
function.description: Expands to the ID of the current skin the target is using, or 'default' by default.

function.name: gender
function.description: Expands to 'male' or 'female' depending on the character's gender.

function.name: ifMale
function.description: Displays text conditionally based on whether the target is male or not.

param.name: true
param.label: When male:
param.description: Text when male (ex. his).

param.name: false
param.label: When female:
param.description: Text when not male (ex. her).

function.name: position
function.description: Expands to 'left', 'right', or 'self' based on the target's position on the screen relative to this character.

function.name: size
function.description: Expands to small, medium, or large based on the character's chest or penis size.

function.name: slot
function.description: Expands to 1, 2, 3, or 4 based on the target's position on screen, where 1 is leftmost and 4 is rightmost.

function.name: tag
function.description: Expands to 'true' or 'false' depending on if the target has this tag.

function.name: place
function.description: Expands to the character's current place (1-5) based on layers remaining.

function.name: revplace
function.description: Expands to the character's current place in reverse order (1-5) based on layers remaining, so 1 means in last place.

function.name: lead
function.description: Expands to the number of remaining layers this character has over 2nd place when in the leader, or a negative number difference from the leader if not in first.

function.name: trail
function.description: When in last place, expands to the difference in layers between this character and 2nd to last.

function.name: hand
function.description: Expands to a description of the character's hand (ex. a pair of aces)

function.name: diff
function.description: Difference between the number of layers of this player and other.

param.name: other
param.label: Other character:
param.description: ID of the character to compare to.
